name: COROPATA
description:
Autonomous character use action.
A game in which you can use various items to help the girl "HIMAWARI" who is "using". But the girls are very capricious and do what they want ...?
It is a game that helps the automatically moving little girl "HIMAWARI".
The objects placed on the stage are incomplete.
The player places the object and completes it.
There are also items that adjust the physical strength and mood of "HIMAWARI".
The behavior of "Sunflower" changes depending on your physical strength and mood.
It is a puzzle game where you solve items.
(Steam version of Nintendo DS dedicated software released in 2009)
